title: The birth of Merlin, or, The childe hath found his father as it hath been several times acted with great applause / written by William Shakespear and William Rowley.
author: Rowley, William, 1585?-1642?
publisher: Printed by Tho. Johnson for Francis Kirkman and Henry Marsh ...,
notes: The ascription to Shakespeare is not generally accepted.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
